problem.markdown:
Suppose now that Machine 1 now fails every hour, 10 minutes into the hour, for 10 minutes.
>>How many parts are produced in the first hour? Assume the buffer is empty.<<
= 49
[explanation] if machine 1 is down for 10 minutes, the system loses 10 parts of production. Also, machine 2 must wait 1 minute at startup, thus the system will lose 11 parts in the first hour. [explanation]
>> How many parts are produced if we increase the Kanban count from 1 to 10 in the first hour? Assume the buffer is empty.<<
=49
[explanation] Increasing the Kanban will not help, since the buffer inventory will be 0. It will only help if the second machine goes down. [explanation]
